Title: Provides for pollinator protection
Summary: Provides for best practices and management policies, and increased awareness regarding the protection of the pollinator population in the state.
LawCode: Ren Art 15-A to be Art 15-B, add Art 15-A §§175-e - 175-k, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to pollinator protection
